mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member(member_email, member_name, member_password, member_birth) VALUES (#{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberBirth} );
mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(*) = 1, 1, 0) FROM Member WHERE member_email =#{memberEmail} ;
